name: Bingo Blast: #1 Party Game App
description:
Join the world’s #1 free bingo app, Bingo Blast! Experience the thrill of over 30 unique Bingo rooms, get FREE coins daily, and win huge Bingo prizes! Compete with MILLIONS of other players to be a bingo champion!

If you love bingo and are looking for a fun new bingo game, this is the game for you. Here are some awesome features:


CLASSIC BINGO GAMES!
- Enter one of our 15+ Classic rooms.
- Play up to 8 cards at a time
- Multiple ways to win a bingo game
- New rooms every two weeks!


GO ON AN ADVENTURE:
-Fly around the world with Tomo and Pluto
- Play BINGO in exotic places like Cancun, Paris, Venice, and so many others!

SPECIAL ROOMS
- Experience Bingo like never before in our amazing Feature rooms!
- Feed cookie monster delicious treats, rescue princess from the dragon, train your own paw patrol and help Shakespeare to write his next great master-piece


Exclusive Bingo Blast Features!
- Bet in regular, special and premium modes
- New rooms every 2 weeks
- Huge Jackpot prizes in Premium mode
- Get extra daubs with a golden ball in the end of game



Be a Bingo-playing machine with the top Bingo app in the world! Download Bingo Adventure today and enjoy FREE BINGO in exclusive rooms and mini-games!


PLEASE NOTE : This app lets you purchase digital content using real money. You can turn off payments by disabling in-app purchases in your device settings.
